summary: The document is a restricted military record detailing an investigation into Manuel Marti, a Private E-1 in the US Army, born in San Juan, Puerto Rico. It includes references to his father's birth certificate and is linked to the 771st MI Detachment at Fort Brooke, Puerto Rico. Originally classified, the document was made public with certain redactions in 1995.
key_findings: The document pertains to an investigation of Manuel Marti, a US Army personnel.
It includes information about Marti's father's birth certificate.
The document was created by the 771st MI Detachment and is dated September 24, 1968.
Originally classified, it was released to the public with certain deletions on March 7, 1995.
